title: News: Flying Lotus Reveals Himself As Captain Murphy
body:
In news that’s not likely to surprise anyone, least of all myself, **Flying Lotus** has revealed himself as the man behind the mask of [Captain Murphy.](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/music/18351-video-new-captain-murphy-duality-mixtape/ "Video & New: Captain Murphy – Duality Mixtape")

**Captain Murphy** was due to give his first live performance at L.A.’s **Low End Theory** last night. The mysterious rapper took to the stage in [**cape and hood**](http://instagram.com/p/SmvSO_IjFB/), and than finally revealed himself to be Mr. **Ellison.**

So, it’s all over, nothing to see here. Move along. Download **Murphy**’s debut mixtape, Duality, [HERE.](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/music/18351-video-new-captain-murphy-duality-mixtape/ "Video & New: Captain Murphy – Duality Mixtape")
